content: crocheted pussy hat by tugboat yarning // maggie h-g @tugboatyarning materials abbreviations worsted weight pink yarn r = row crochet hook size i /5 5mm chain = chain darning needle st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch sizing half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet small head circumference 21-22 double_crochet = double_crochet small/medium head circ 22-23 fpdc = front post double_crochet medium head circ 23-24 bpdc = back post double_crochet *instructions* = repeat around basic structure when lying flat the hat will look like a square/rectangle when worn it gives the appearance of two cat ears peeking out when making the hat you will begin at the top of the hat chaining the full width joining the chains then crocheting around and around at the bottom you will create a ribbed band to go around the forehead then will turn the hat inside out and whip stitch the top edge where you started directions size small chain 62 size small/medium chain 66 size medium chain 70… r1 slip_stitch to first chain to join being careful not to twist the chain s r2 half_double_crochet in ea st around then slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet to join sm & sm/med r3-r16 chain 2 double_crochet in ea st around slip_stitch to first to join r17-r18 chain 2 *fpdc bpdc* slip_stitch to first fpdc to join finish medium only r3-r17 chain 2 double_crochet in ea st around slip_stitch to first to join r18-r19 chain 2 *fpdc bpdc* slip_stitch to first fpdc to join finish @tugboatyarning flip the hat inside out and lay flat taking a 20 strand of yarn whip stitch the two layers of hat together tie off and weave in ends turn right side out and wear to support the rights of women permission to use this pattern you may use this pattern for personal or commercial use and frankly you can print it and share it with whomever you like please don t take my photos though they re of me and well mine if you have further questions be sure to check out www pussyhatproject com
